oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: DEPRECATED: Evaluate to true if the binary datatype is properly supported
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the binary datatype and all of its valid operations.

oval-def:modified.comment: Deprecating in favor of new OVAL Test Content

oval-def:criteria.comment: True if the equals operation is supported

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check of the equals operation with a single equal binary value.
Check of the equals operation with a single unequal binary value.

oval-def:criteria.comment: True if the not equal operation is supported

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check of the not equal operation with a single equal binary value.
Check of the not equal operation with a single unequal binary value.
